title.rendered: The Permanent Secretary, MFA, Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience Ms Ugochi Daniels, Deputy Director General Operations of the International Organization for Migration (IOM).

content.rendered:
Today, 11th August, 2023, the Permanent Secretary, MFA, Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience Ms. Ugochi Daniels, Deputy Director General Operations of the International Organization for Migration (IOM). She was accompanied by H.E. Mr. Laurent M.J. De Boeck, Chief of Mission of IOM to Nigeria.

Discussions centered on migration-related matters.
